Pemkab Pamekasan Siapkan Dana Rp 200 Juta per Desa Untuk Pengadaan Mobil Sehat
05 Nov 2019, 08:19 by Iswantoro


Pemkab Pamekasan Siapkan Dana Rp 200 Juta per Desa Untuk Pengadaan Mobil Sehat

KBRN, Pamekasan : Untuk meningkatkan pelayanan di bidang kesehatan, Pemerintah Kabupaten Pamekasan mengalokasikan anggaran sebesar Rp 200 juta di setiap desa untuk pengadaan mobil sehat. Hal itu disampaikan Sekretaris Daerah Kabupaten Pamekasan Totok Hartono.
Ia mengatakan, mobil sehat itu, akan menjadi mobil operasional di 178 desa yang tersebar di 13 kecamatan, untuk antar jemput warganya yang sakit.
“Per desa Rp 200 juta, mobil itu seperti ambulans, tempat untuk pasien tidur, ada rotatornya,” ucapnya, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Sementara itu, Wakil Bupati Pamekasan Rajae menambahkan, paling awal realisasi mobil sehat itu pada tahun 2020 mendatang.
“Sekarang kan masih menunggu transfer ke beberapa desa, karena ini bentuknya keungan khusus yang kita transfer ke desa-desa, bukan langsung dibelanjakan oleh pemerintah kabupaten, tetapi nanti kita transfer ke desa, tentunya pengawasan tetap ada di Pemkab Pamekasan,” ungkapnya.
Rajae menegaskan, pihaknya melangkah sesuai dengan yang ada di Rencana Pembangunan Jangka Menengah Daerah (RPJMD) Pamekasan.

Pamekasan Regency Government Prepares Funds of IDR 200 Million per Village for Procurement of Healthy Cars
05 Nov 2019, 08:19 by Iswantoro


Pamekasan Regency Government Prepares Funds of IDR 200 Million per Village for Procurement of Healthy Cars

KBRN, Pamekasan: To improve health services, the Pamekasan Regency Government has allocated a budget of Rp 200 million in each village for the supply of healthy cars. This was conveyed by Pamekasan Regency Regional Secretary Totok Hartono.
He said the healthy car would become an operational car in 178 villages spread across 13 sub-districts to transport the sick residents.
"Per village of Rp 200 million, the car is like an ambulance, a place for patients to sleep, there is a rotator," he said, Tuesday (11/05/2019).
Meanwhile, Deputy Regent of Pamekasan Rajae added, the earliest realization of the healthy car in 2020.
"Right now we are still waiting for transfers to several villages, because this is a special form of money that we transfer to villages, not directly spent by the district government, but later we transfer to villages, of course supervision remains in the Pamekasan Regency Government," he said.
Rajae asserted, his side stepped in accordance with that in the Pamekasan Regional Medium-Term Development Plan (RPJMD).
